statements: DELETE FROM PrisonOvercrowding WHERE current_population > capacity
DELETE FROM PrisonCells WHERE cell_type = 'Maximum Security';
DELETE FROM Prisoners WHERE crime = 'Theft' AND age < 25;
DELETE FROM Prisoners WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Cells WHERE capacity < 10 AND prison_block = 'Block A';
DELETE FROM Cells WHERE occupancy >= 50 AND capacity <= 100;
DELETE FROM PrisonVisitors WHERE visit_date < '2023-01-01' AND relationship = 'Family';
